bug.title: Foxfire will not download neopets toolbar.
bug.description:
User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322) Build Identifier: Foxfire
I download it and the proces goes through, but when I open the webpage there's no toolbar and there's is no where to be found it in the view(toolbars).
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Uninstal the toolbar. 2. 3.
